meanings.definition: A layer placed between two other layers.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a delicious cream interlayer.
meanings.sent2: The interlayer of cheese added a savory touch to the lasagna.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally put an interlayer of paper between my sandwich slices!
meanings.sent4: The interlayer of fog made it hard to see the road ahead.
meanings.sent5: The interlayer of ice on the windshield needed to be scraped off before driving.

meanings.definition: To place a layer between two other layers.
meanings.sent1: She carefully interlayered the sheets of phyllo dough with butter.
meanings.sent2: The chef interlayered the pasta with rich tomato sauce.
meanings.sent3: He interlayered the clothes in his suitcase like a game of Tetris.
meanings.sent4: The artist interlayered colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The construction worker interlayered bricks to build a sturdy wall.
